fields.value:
__Tome of Eternal Flow__
His Signature and his BiS.
__Sacrificial Jade__
Battle Pass weapon, but has everything he wants.
__Prototype Amber__
Craftable option that even heals his entire team.
__Ballad of the Boundless Blue__
An Event weapon, free to R5 but still worse than Prototype Amber.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Kagura's Verity, Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds, Jadefall's Splendor

__Widsith__
Great especially at high refinements if you roll the Elemental DMG Bonus%. Elemental Mastery and ATK% are generally wasted on him.
